headline: RTX (NYSE:RTX): Evaluating Valuation After EU Clears Pratt & Whitney’s GTF Advantage Engine for Commercial Launch
summary: The recent validation of Pratt & Whitney’s GTF Advantage engine by the European Union Aviation Safety Agency marks an important regulatory step for RTX (NYSE:RTX). With U.S. certification already secured, this development clears the way for the engine’s commercial debut. See our latest analysis for RTX. RTX’s momentum has been building all year, with a steady string of technological launches and contract wins helping to fuel investor confidence. The company’s latest share price of $157.95...

headline: How GTF Advantage Engine Certification Could Affect RTX (RTX) Profitability and Aftermarket Strategy
summary: Pratt & Whitney, a division of RTX, recently received type certification from the European Union Aviation Safety Agency for its GTF Advantage aircraft engine, following prior approval from the US Federal Aviation Administration and enabling entry into commercial service. This milestone highlights RTX's commitment to advancing fuel-efficient aerospace propulsion, with the new engine offering increased thrust, improved efficiency, and enhanced capability for aircraft operators. We'll examine...
